posts.post_title: Traded T213 Coupon Type 2 Walter Johnson
posts.post_content:
Update. Traded.
Looking to trade (not selling) my T213 Coupon Type 2 WaJo. (See below for picture). I recently upgraded.

Looking to trade for or towards any of the followings WaJos in low grade. Would make up any difference in cash or trade.

T3 Turkey Red (Turkey Red Back)
T205 Honest Long Back
T206 Hands at Chest- American Beauty, EPDG, Cycle 460, Piedmont 460 #42
T206 Portrait- Hindu Brown, Sovereign 350 Dk Gr
T207 Napoleon Back
T222 Fatima

Please PM me if interested and have any of these available. Would consider other rare WaJos not listed.

Thanks
Chad
